SEARCH
Package cp213

Class Order

java.lang.Object
cp213.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
public class Order extends Object implements Printable
Stores a HashMap of MenuItem objects and the quantity of each MenuItem ordered. Each MenuItem may appear only once in the HashMap.
Version:
2024-10-15
Author:
Michael Marsillo 169057769 mars7769@mylaurier.ca, Abdul-Rahman Mawlood-Yunis, David Brown

    • TAX_RATE

      public static final BigDecimal TAX_RATE
      The current tax rate on menu items.

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order()

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(MenuItem item, int quantity)
      Increments the quantity of a particular MenuItem in an Order with a new quantity. If the MenuItem is not in the order, it is added.
      Parameters:
      item - The MenuItem to purchase - the HashMap key.
      quantity - The number of the MenuItem to purchase - the HashMap value.

    • getSubTotal

      public BigDecimal getSubTotal()
      Calculates the total value of all MenuItems and their quantities in the HashMap.
      Returns:
      the total cost for the MenuItems ordered.

    • getTaxes

      public BigDecimal getTaxes()
      Calculates and returns the total taxes to apply to the subtotal of all MenuItems in the order. Tax rate is TAX_RATE.
      Returns:
      total taxes on all MenuItems

    • getTotal

      public BigDecimal getTotal()
      Calculates and returns the total cost of all MenuItems order, including tax.
      Returns:
      total cost

    • print

      public int print(Graphics graphics, PageFormat pageFormat, int pageIndex) throws PrinterException
      Specified by:
      print in interface Printable
      Throws:
      PrinterException

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a String version of a receipt for all the MenuItems in the order.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • update

      public void update(MenuItem item, int quantity)
      Replaces the quantity of a particular MenuItem in an Order with a new quantity. If the MenuItem is not in the order, it is added. If quantity is 0 or negative, the MenuItem is removed from the Order.
      Parameters:
      item - The MenuItem to update
      quantity - The quantity to apply to item
